short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,e: The safe way to access your personal mail.
short.de: Der sichere Klick in Dein Postfach.
short.es: La forma segura de acceder a su correo personal.
short.fr: Un moyen sûr d'accéder à vos e-mails personnels.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,e:
E-Mail notification in the browser

Read, write and delete emails with only one click

Access to all your email accounts in only one tool (e.g. mail.com, gmx.com, WEB.DE)

Encrypted SSL connection and password protection with highest security standards

Chrome permissions required by MailCheck:
https://support.mail.com/mailcheck/chrome/permissions.html
long.de:
E-Mail Benachrichtigung im Browser

Mit einem Klick E-Mails lesen und schreiben

Bequem mehrere FreeMail Konten auf einmal verwalten (z.B. mail.com, WEB.DE, GMX)

Verschlüsselte SSL-Verbindung und Passwortschutz mit höchsten 
Sicherheitsstandards
long.es,fr:
E-Mail notification in the browser

Read, write and delete emails with only one click

Access to all your email accounts in only one tool (e.g. mail.com, GMX, WEB.DE)

Encrypted SSL connection and password protection with highest security standards

Chrome permissions required by MailCheck:
https://support.mail.com/mailcheck/chrome/permissions.html
